reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 6 Pack Super Slim Dimmer Switch, Single Pole or 3-Way, Dimmable Light Switch for LED, CFL, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, ETL Listed, White
reviews.text: Overall this is a good deal for a pack of dimmer switches that work as good as any I have used. Installation seemed standard, dimmer switches are always tighter than a regular switch and these compare to any other dimmer switch. There is an internal knob that allows you to adjust the brightness of the actual dimmer so the switch does not go too dim to the point that the light turns off. This is not my favorite style switch because it doesnâ€™t quite match the standard toggle or rocker switch, but it works great and is the best deal I found at the time.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2021
reviews.title: Best Deal

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 6 Pack Super Slim Dimmer Switch, Single Pole or 3-Way, Dimmable Light Switch for LED, CFL, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, ETL Listed, White
reviews.text: I love the thinness of these dimmers. They fit nicely in crowded electrical boxes and have light intensity settings to control how much to dim. Unfortunately, 4 out of the 12 I have caused severe light flickering and had to replace them. For that reason, I can't give more than 2 stars.
reviews.date: Reviewed in Canada on January 9, 2025
reviews.title: Prone to Light Flickering
